m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Latest:Archive:2011:Jan-Mar "Latest Features" Archive: January - March, 2011 Click here for most recent "latest" listings. 2011 See Latest:Archive:2011:Apr-Jun - going forward in time March Featured : Nuclear > Cold Fusion > Mordkovitch > Zirconium Flavored Cold Fusion from the Ukraine - Ukranian inventor, Professor Bolotov, has developed a cold fusion reactor based on the transmutation of Zirconium to other elements. He claims a system could have an input of 5 kW and an output of 200 kW. This is from a system that only costs 10,000 euro to build.  It was demon
